choices.C: Use subsecond keepalives for the peers.
choices.E: Use Fast Peering Session Deactivation for the peers.
choices.F: Use subsecond minimum route advertisement Interval timers for the peers.
choices.D: Use subsecond hold timers for the peers.
choices.B: Use Selective Address Tracking and match the peers.
choices.A: Use Bidirectional Forwarding Detection for the peers.

questions.question_text: Your company requires two diverse multihop External Border Gateway Protocol peerings to a partner network. Which two methods would you use to improve lost peer detection? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
AE
Selective Address Tracking and match the peers is part of part of Fast Peering Session Deactivation

questions.question_text: A network design includes a long signaling delay in notifying the Layer 3 control plane that an interface has failed. Which two of these actions would reduce that delay? (Choose two.)

choices.C: Reduce the time for the network to reconverge.
choices.A: Enable lower data link layer recovery systems to have an opportunity to restore the interface.
choices.B: Increase the notification of interface flaps.

discussion.content: I think the correct question for this answers would be. Which two of these actions would be results of adding this delay? (Choose two.)

For me, non of the answers makes sense.
The question is what reduces the delay - not what stableizes the network

ABE A is negligible, but BE are important so you don't cause an outage whilst making the change and the change window is at an appropriate time for your business
CD are wrong as hellos are independent of routing table size and the number of address-families

choices.E: service provider scheduling of changes to the PE
choices.C: number of routes on the CE router
choices.B: service provider agreement to support tuned timers
choices.D: number of VRFs on the PE router

questions.question_text: A senior network designer suggests that you should improve network convergence times by reducing BGP timers between your CE router and the PE router of the service provider. Which three factors should you to consider when you adjust the timer values? (Choose three.)

FIFO queuing is being used on all routers in a network. The primary application running on the network is data backup using FTP. At certain times, users experience cyclical performance degradation.
What two things might mitigate this problem and help ensure bandwidth is used effectively in the network? (Choose two.)

choices.D: MPLS-TP uses an IANA assigned label 13 for OAM.
choices.B: MPLS-TP includes extensions to native MPLS OAM for fault detection, monitoring, and propagation.
choices.A: MPLS-TP is a newer packet transport technology that replaces SONET/SDH.

discussion.content: ABD is correct answer. MPLS-TP idea is no routing at all. check here, for example: https://www.cisco.com/en/US/technologies/tk436/tk428/white_paper_c11-562013.html

Bcd
OSPF-TE or ISIS-TE with GMPLS extensions
 is used for dynamic routing within an MPLS-TP domain.

questions.question_text: You have been hired by a startup company to provide optical services using MPLS-TP. Which three options describe reasons to use the MPLS-TP standard in your design? (Choose three.)
